fields.name: name
fields.label: Your prolific ID:

fields.name: consent
fields.label: To proceed, you must expressly provide consent per the terms above.

options.label: I consent to all of the above and I agree to answer the survey questions thoughtfully.

fields.name: agreement
fields.label: To proceed, you must expressly agree to the provided instructions.

options.label: I agree with the provided instructions.

tasks.name: Intro questions
tasks.instructions: Please read very carefully the following statements and rate how strongly they describe how you normally feel. Use the following scale. Do not linger too much on the single statements and answer as sincerely as you can.

fields.name: instr_empathy
fields.label: We will first ask you to answer some questions about yourself. Please read very carefully the following statements and rate how strongly they describe how you normally feel. Use the following scale. Do not linger too much on the single statements and answer as sincerely as you can.

fields.name: empathy1
fields.label: While I see a friend crying, I feel myself getting teary-eyed.

fields.name: empathy2
fields.label: Often, I am able to understand how people feel even before they tell me.

fields.name: empathy3
fields.label: Scenes in movies where the main character cries because everything turns out for the best, give me tears of joy.

fields.name: empathy4
fields.label: When a friend is angry, I am usually aware of it right away.

fields.name: empathy5
fields.label: When I see someone get hurt in a movie, it’s as if I can feel the pain too.

fields.name: empathy6
fields.label: I am usually able to understand instinctively when my friends are scared.

fields.name: empathy7
fields.label: When I see someone hit his/her finger with a hammer, I feel pain too.

fields.name: empathy8
fields.label: When someone feels worried, I am able to understand intuitively that person’s state of mind.

fields.name: empathy9
fields.label: When I watch dramatic movies, I feel the same sadness as the characters in the story.

fields.name: empathy10
fields.label: I know intuitively if someone that I love is angry.

fields.name: empathy11
fields.label: Seeing an adult cry because of pain makes me suddenly get teary-eyed.

fields.name: empathy12
fields.label: I know right away if someone is angry about something that happened to him/her.

fields.name: empathy13
fields.label: When I see someone get hurt, I feel his/her pain as if I were hurt, without being able to distance myself from the pain.

fields.name: empathy14
fields.label: I can understand intuitively how the people I love feel.

fields.name: empathy15
fields.label: Those who know me tell me that I am not able to distance myself from the sadness of others.

fields.name: empathy16
fields.label: During a phone call, I am able to perceive the tension in the voice of a person I know as soon as he/she starts talking.

fields.name: empathy17
fields.label: Those who know me tell me that I am very affected by the emotions of others.

fields.name: empathy18
fields.label: I can quickly intuit the state of mind of a person I know even if he/she tries to hide his/her real emotions.

fields.name: empathy19
fields.label: My parents think that seeing one of my relatives cry completely upsets me.

fields.name: empathy20
fields.label: I am able to know intuitively that a person feels uncomfortable even when I am in a group of people.

fields.name: empathy21
fields.label: When someone standing close to me jumps suddenly because of an unexpected noise, I immediately feel my heart start beating excitedly.

fields.name: empathy22
fields.label: My intuition helps me to understand if someone is angry.

fields.name: empathy23
fields.label: When I see another person excited because of something that happened to him/her, I feel excited myself.

fields.name: empathy24
fields.label: I am good at intuitively understanding the feelings of others.

fields.name: empathy25
fields.label: People that come with me to the movie theater tell me that I get completely involved with the emotions of the characters in the movie.

fields.name: empathy26
fields.label: I notice immediately if someone in a group feels uncomfortable.

fields.name: empathy27
fields.label: Hearing about someone grieving from a recent loss immediately makes me feel sad.

fields.name: empathy28
fields.label: People tell me that I am good at intuitively understanding the emotions of others even if someone is trying to hide his/her emotions.

fields.name: empathy29
fields.label: If someone feels anguish, my heart immediately starts beating quickly.

fields.name: empathy30
fields.label: I can understand right away if a person I love is happy.

tasks.name: Segment 1
tasks.instructions: Watch the video and answer the following questions. Trust your personal intuition! You can rewatch the segment as many times as you need.

fields.name: interest
fields.label: To what extent is the group  **interested** in this moment?

fields.name: importance
fields.label: To what extent does this moment seem **important** for the group?
